socialmedia.title: Facebook
socialmedia.description: Facebook-It is an online social media network that connects people through an online platform.By sharing content like text,images,videos.Users can contribute ideas and join conversations with other people.

socialmedia.title: Instagram
socialmedia.description: Instagram-It is a photo and video sharing social networking service.The app allow users to upload media that can be edited with filters and organized by hashtags and geographical tagging.

socialmedia.title: Twitter
socialmedia.description: Twitter-It is a service for friends,family and coworkers to communicate and stay connected through the exchange of quick,frequent messages.People posts Tweets,which may contain photos,videos,links and text.

socialmedia.title: LinkedIn
socialmedia.description: LinkedIn-It is a business and employment-focused social media platform that works through websites and mobile apps.Moto is to connect the world's professionals to make them more productive and successful.

socialmedia.title: Google
socialmedia.description: Google-It focuses on online advertising,search engine technology,cloud computing,computer software,quantum computing,e-commerce,AI and consumer electronics.
